attributes.action: Implement a strategy to rebuild the British manufacturing sector.
attributes.background:
•	Provide financial support to sustain and expand British 
        manufacturing
•	Legislate to facilitate the growth and British ownership and 
        control of manufacturing companies
•	Promote British manufactured products

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government's Industrial Strategy aims to provide support to a range of sectors such as aerospace and life sciences involved in UK manufacturing. 

The Government has also recently launched the Manufacturing Made Smarter Challenge, with £300m of joint government and industry funding to support businesses implement new tech to boost their manufacturing productivity. See:
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/300-million-to-boost-uk-manufacturing-productivity-by-30

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
